column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Queen - Thank you very much for the 5-star review. We greatly appreciate it. I'm glad you received great service during your visit
column2: and I'm also glad you enjoyed our fare. To be fair
column3: not all of our patrons are into our dining atmosphere when we are full (ie. "young
column4: vibrant and "very loud"). So it's always refreshing to get feedback from folks who sort of "get" what we're going for in our business. Thank you again
column5: and we hope to serve you again soon.
